      • processDataAsPredictedDifferencesToTest

        public Map<Long,List<Double>> processDataAsPredictedDifferencesToTest()
        Method that transforms the user data from pairs of (item, score) into lists of differences, by using groundtruth information.
        Returns:
        a map with the transformed data, one list per user
